name: settings-moderation
description: Manages the auto-moderation settings for this server
resetDescription: Reset a setting value to its default
attachmentDescription: The settings for when a user uploads an attachment
uppercaseDescription: The settings for when a user sends a message with too many uppercase letters
inviteDescription: The settings for when a user sends an invite link
linkDescription: The settings for when a user sends a link
filterDescription: The settings for when a user sends a filtered word
newlineDescription: The settings for when a user sends too many newlines
duplicatedMessagesDescription: The settings for when users send too many duplicated messages
enabledDescription: Whether or not this system is enabled
onInfractionAlertDescription: Whether or not to send an alert when a user is infracted
onInfractionLogDescription: The channel to log infractions at
onInfractionDeleteDescription: Whether or not to delete the message when a user is infracted
onThresholdDescription: The penalty to apply when a user reaches the threshold
penaltyDurationDescription: The duration of the applied penalty, if available
thresholdMaximumDescription: The maximum number of infractions a user can have before the threshold is reached
thresholdExpirationDescription: The amount of time before the threshold expires
